<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expanded Splash](/Feats.aspx?ID=109) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=7" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 79 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Demolitionist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=118) (Level 12)

**Prerequisites**
[Calculated Splash](/Feats.aspx?ID=99)

</column>

---

The particularly volatile compounds that you brew into your bombs result in them creating especially large and powerful explosions. When you throw an alchemical bomb that has the [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) trait, you can add your Intelligence modifier to the bomb’s usual splash damage, and it deals splash damage to every creature within 10 feet of the target.

<title level="2">Expanded Splash leads to...</title>
[Controlled Blast](/Feats.aspx?ID=3243), [Mega Bomb](/Feats.aspx?ID=128)
name: Expanded Splash
